interactions.query: What is the return policy for electronics?
interactions.response: According to our policy document, electronics can be returned within 30 days of purchase with the original receipt. The item must be in its original packaging and in working condition. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

retrieved_documents.content: Section 3.1 - Return Policy. Electronic items may be returned within 30 days of purchase. Original receipt and packaging are required. Items must be in working condition.
Section 3.2 - Refund Processing. All approved refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days to the original payment method.

interactions.query: How do I track my order?
interactions.response: You can track your order by logging into your account on our website and navigating to 'Order History'. Click on the specific order to view tracking information. You can also use the tracking number sent via email to check status on the carrier's website.

retrieved_documents.content: Order Tracking Guide. Customers can track orders through their account dashboard under 'Order History'. Tracking numbers are also sent via email once the order ships.

interactions.query: What payment methods do you accept?
interactions.response: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. For orders over $500, we also offer financing options through our partner.

retrieved_documents.content: Payment Methods. Accepted payment methods include: Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
Financing Options. Orders exceeding $500 are eligible for financing through our partnership program. Apply at checkout.
